Configuration.Name: Fellowship Github Runners
Configuration.Description: Polkadot Fellowship is a technical governance body of engineers that steers core protocol direction and reviews upgrades. IBP-hosted GitHub Actions runners provide scalable CI compute to build, test, benchmark, and validate releases.

Configuration.Name: IBP Authoritative GeoDNS Runner
Configuration.Description: IBP members run geographically distributed authoritative GeoDNS runner nodes to provide resilient anycast-like resolution, ensuring users are directed to the nearest healthy infrastructure provider while maintaining low TTL dynamic routing and shared operational coverage.

Configuration.Name: Bulletin Chain
Configuration.Description: Polkadot Bulletin Chain is a dedicated BaBE+GRANDPA chain that stores People Chain bridge-authorized transaction data for a rolling retention window (currently ~2 weeks) and serves it via IPFS/Bitswap with proofs of storage.
